data.text: super easy to use, withdrawal money, and send money. not to mention the spot me which is fee free you're just asked to tip to help others as well. I've had for almost 6 years and haven't had a problem. easy to dispute any charges and can control everything by app. would highly recommend to anyone. credit builder built my credit 100 points within 6 months.

Qs far as Checking and savings accounts go, I've had a few issues but uexpected after banking 3+ years. But about a year ago I switched jobs and my new direct deposit started going here. Then all of a sudden my Credit Builder Card gets denied they closed my Credit Builder accout for no payment!! I forgot to add my direct deposit to take a portion of $ out which was shown as nonpayment! It's a Damn prepaid credit card, how can you not make a payment on a prepaid card. There NO payments to miss!!
data.replyText:
Hi Aaron! We appreciate the review, and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363!

data.text: I love Tha different accounts, checking, credit builder and savings. easy to instantly transfer money between them, as much as you want and often as you want for free. nothing builds credit faster. also free boosts, go negative without penalty, you can earn money when your friends n family join with a direct deposit. I'll never use a bank again!!!

They make it easy to move money between accounts and pay others across multiple platforms. If needed they offer free overdraft protection that comes in handy if money is tight. The credit builder card is fantastic to help build or repair your credit rating. They also have great rewards for referrals. I would recommend Chime to anyone.

I've have physical bank buildings in my area to choose from. However, NONE of them were as friendly and helpful as Chime. The option to turn off all transactions is WONDERFUL. I admit when I first started my Chime account, I was skeptical. Due to the fact theres no physical building (in driving distance) if I did have a problem. On the few occasions, I needed to talk to someone a Chime representative was there. Gotta say thank you, Chime, for always having my back. Plus, my credit is going up!

I've boosted my credit score 103 points using chime! They help me with their spotme almost weekly for groceries and gas or anything else we may need for my family. I HIGHLY recommend this banking app to everyone and anyone looking for a simple and better way of banking!! They also allow us to access a small part of our next week's check for emergencies which we've needed a few times. This banking app has really saved our butts more times than I can count!

Absolutely horrible! I've had my account for years and because of a small negative balance (literally less than $5) they close my account, didn't give me an option to clear the negative balance and then told me I couldn't reopen or get a new account with them. Which is ludicrous! I've been a very loyal customer. I've been having financial difficulties due to medical issues and finally I was able to get back on track and they did this! Unacceptable!
data.replyText:
Hi Shauntay! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. Having your account closed is incredibly a frustrating experience.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: chime is generally very simple with the basics (checking, saving, credit builder etc). mobile live chat with customer service is great as well, and you can contact other ways too. I like the ability to boost & get boosted with spot me HOWEVER I used to get at least 40 or 50 spot me, then suddenly they changed eligibility requirements for direct deposit minimum which I find unfair. but over all chime is pretty decent. if spot me was fixed to before I'd Def give 5 stars

This used to be a good app, it works perfectly fine, I would give it five start but, my problem is when you get signed out accidentally it's hard to log back in. I tried getting into my account multiple times, and they said "we will send an email in a few minutes" well it's been longer than a few minutes and still no email for password reset. This isn't an issue on my end, I've tried multiple times and still no email has came through, this issue needs to be resolved.
data.replyText: Hey there, We appreciate the review, and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. If we can help with anything, get in touch with us at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: this app truly does help increase credit score! (as long as you don't transfer 100% of direct deposits to credit builder) think about what creditors are looking at and looking for. this app allows you to show them what they're looking for. my girlfriend showed chime to me. she showed me how her credit score went from 496 before chime and only a year and a half later her score is 726! I didn't believe it until I seen it for myself and then signed up!

I've been using chime for about half a year now. The app is alright, a reasonable bank with easy access, the cash grabbing has made me want to switch. The companies they partner with to 'save' you money and incredibly scummy, but the final nail in the coffin is that every time I get a direct deposit, I'm asked to 'tip'. Even if it is optional, this shouldn't be present on a banking app. You aren't door dash, you're a gosh darned bank.
data.replyText:
Hi Conor! Tips allow Chime to improve the service and make it available to more members. Tipping is completely optional, and it doesn't affect your SpotMe limit or eligibility. However, we hear you and can certainly see how this would be useful. We'll share your feedback with our team internally and look into this.

Thanks for being a Chime member!

data.text: Chime is Great and won't bleed your account on unnecessary fees. Not just overdraft fees, but most banks will not tell you. 2 years later and still working great. One thing I put on my reviews now is usually once a week, or it should be automatic. Go to your Play store,go to manage apps, and press update all, and this will update all your apps on the Play Store that you have downloaded. This fixes a lot of issues that come up when you're in the middle of using the app

I have and always will appreciate Chime for its ability to help those who are stuck in poor credit cycle in its own unique way. The automatic transfers are useful as well, and I like the color scheme very much. Having a credit check feature available is very handy, though I have yet to use it. In general, the app is charming, simple to navigate, convenient, helpful, and has also been informative in building/checking credit.

I've used this app for years.. works perfectly fine until you go to transfer funds in the app, and set your cash amount and what account, and go to hit the "Transfer" button and it does nothing. Close the app, do it all over again and it works fine.... VERY FRUSTRATING. It only seems to happen when I'm in a rush at a store or a meetup trying to transfer. When I'm not in any rushes and no time crunch, the transfer button works fine... I HATE IT. Please fix this bug!!!!
data.replyText:
Hi Bruce! We appreciate the review, and we‚Äôre sorry to hear about this. You can uninstall and reinstall the app, update your app to the latest version, try to use WIFI or cellular data, if you‚Äôre using VPN, sign out and try again.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363!

data.text: it's a good app and I enjoy their debit card and the credit builder card is helpful in trying to rebuild my horrible credit ! The savings account is a plus also. It's really convenient to be able to move funds between my cards and other ones I use. I like being able to send money to anyone even if they don't use chime. The spot me feature is probably the best thing about the company. it's been a huge help many times . Customer service has always been very friendly and helpful. Good security feat

Great as far as free checking accounts go, savings and credit builder accounts are a definite plus. If you use more than one device at a time to log in, (work phone, personal phone, tablet) it will get hung up on verification and authentications and won't let you log in. I was locked out for a couple days for "suspicious activity" and man, that was dicey for a minute with no access to my money. All in all, great banking but it IS free.

This is the best for building back my credit. I've had Chime for 2 years, no issues. I ordered the credit card, and since using, my credit score has gone up 110 points in a year. I don't know what else I could have for FREE that could have done the same. All I do is transfer money to the credit account, use just like a credit or debit card (no APR, btw), which you use like a declining balance. At the end of the month, it pays that amount as a payment then reports to credit as paid in full.

I've tried a couple different banking/credit cards that are supposed to help your credit score, none of them are even worth considering anymore. Chime is very simple to set up and use. I've had absolutely no trouble doing anything with their cards, my credit score is steadily increasing. The direct deposits are always there on time, many times appearing early.

This used to be a GREAT app. All of a sudden all notifications stopped. I talked to about 10 different customer service people who all took me thru the same steps. Finally I got a few emails about there being an issue and the engineers were on it. That was a month ago. Still not resolved and not heard a word since. I regretfully am looking for "the next best thing" because without notifications... it's turned into a hassle.

Update: 12/29/23- still not working. Updating my review since I'm here reinstalling again to allow a transfer anyways. Second time this week. Constantly need to reinstall app for transfer to work. 11/13/23- They replied and said that I needed to download over Wi-Fi or cellular data. I have done both of those things. I have the most recent version. I am currently uninstalling and reinstalling again. Second time this week. So I can adjust some settings in spot me which now is not working either.
data.replyText:
Hi Jessica! We're sorry to hear about your experience. Not being able to access your account is an incredibly frustrating experience.

We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

data.text: I've used chime for a while now. I've had payment issues with multiple things, my luck is horrible, and they always correct it almost instantly (1-3 days). The customer service was knowledgeable when I had issues with my card, and is very convenient to be able to send money to anyone regardless of their banking/card service. I've had absolutely no negatives while using chime. Better than any bank I've used.

Had a problem with the original app. I couldn't do a mobile check deposit. Support, had me uninstall it and reinstall the app. Some reason it doesn't show up in the Settings, Notifications, App Notifications, so that the notifications are no longer available. I talked with support and they were no help, basically they were going to put a ticket on it. Under Apps in Chime there's switches to turn notifications on and off but they don't seem to do anything.
data.replyText: Hi Kent! We appreciate the review, and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. If we can help with anything, get in touch with us via support@chime.com or at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: The card started off fantastic for years until one day the app needed to make sure my information was "up to date". I put that in quotes because my information didn't change. Once I went through that process the chime account no longer allowed transferring funds to it. I didn't have this issue prior, and no one gave me an explanation on why information that was never updated needed to be updated. After months of calls I decided to close the account. I do not plan on giving chime another chance.
data.replyText:
We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. Having issues with your card is an incredibly frustrating experience.

We'll share you feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

data.text: I have been with Chime for quite a while, and have been very pleased with the service. However, this app has issues. For the longest time I would just enter my pin and start working with it. Now, every other time or so, I enter the pin and it says goodbye. I'm kicked to the sign-up/login page, sometimes I even have to enter a security code they send me. Seems kind of pointless to me, since they are sending the code directly to the device I'm logging in on. Happens on my phone and tablet.
data.replyText:
1. Uninstall and reinstall the app.
2. Update your app to the latest version
3. Try to use WiFi (if on cellular data) or cellular data (if on WiFi)
4. If you‚Äôre using a VPN, sign out of the VPN and try again
5. Try to use a desktop browser or another mobile device

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: Chime is a great banking service, for beginners or someone with an existing bank. I get paid 2 days early and it lets you select how much money goes into your checking, credit, and savings from your deposit by pre-setting a percentage. You don't have to do that, but I did and it makes it easier. It is compatible with Apple/Google pay, the app lets you view your cards at all times, and there is no overdraft and no fees, I have been using it for almost 2 years now, and have never had a complaint.

Can't add money from my external account. It allowed me to add money from my debit card once and then took away that option, so I can't use the app for savings like I wanted too. But one of my friends is able to add money from his account at the same damn bank as mine which I don't understand. All my information is correct and up to date so it doesn't make since.
data.replyText:
Hi Shaman! We appreciate the review, and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. Being unable to add money from your debit card is an incredibly frustrating experience. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363!

data.text: The app is great and easy to use but the bank absolutely sucks. Ive had chime for over a year and ive had to replace my card 5 times because of unauthorized transactions on my account. They have no account security of any kind and you have to go through 15 minutes of automated voice messaging system before you get to talk to a person that sounds like they live on the other side of the planet.
data.replyText: Hi Wesley! We appreciate the review, and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

data.text: this app is slow and clunky and if you try to scroll thru your transaction history, there is a glitch that won't load them. I've tried for hours to get my transaction history to properly load and it's messed up. I've reinstalled the app, made sure it's completely updated, tried both WiFi and cellular, I don't have a VPN and I tried my iPad, my laptop and mine and the wife's phones. FIX THE TRANSACTION HISTORY LOADING PROBLEM!

data.text: This app is horriable! Been waiting almost a month for a new debit card and every time I try to talk to support that app is not responding and pretty much freezes! I am so beyond frustrated with this I'm about to find a different app. I have direct deposit set up and have had it almost a year and have never gotten my pay 2 days earlier and does not show I have direct deposit set up but get a direct deposite every 2 weeks and don't get any of the perks for having direct deposit!
data.replyText:
Hi Janetta! We're sorry to hear about your recent experience. Having no card to use is an incredibly frustrating experience.

We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363!

data.text: Loved chime for THE LONGEST time, but I'm fed up with not being able to move my money when I need it. I have to exit and reopen the app SEVERAL times to be able to move my money. Close every other app, every tab, everything. Nothing helps except time, apparently. No one has time for that, and nothing else you offer is special anymore compared to similar services.
data.replyText:
Hi Jorge! We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. We‚Äôll share your feedback with our team and look into this.

In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

data.text: One of the best prepaid debit cards! You can also set up a checking and savings account, accepted pretty much everywhere. FREE cash loads at ANY Walgreens! It also comes with a second credit builder credit card, once you set up direct deposit, and that card will allow you to load money on it and use it like a credit card, to help build your credit. Keep a minimum of $250 monthly direct deposit, you qualify for the Spot Me option, which will start you out at being able to overdraft card up to $20

opened the account w/ direct deposit, got my first paycheck & the $100 sign up bonus, no problems. then i tried to link an external account via plaid to transfer my cash to a bank that pays a real interest rate (chime's 2% APY is pathetic). this kept failing. customer support was useless. first they said to uninstall/reinstall the app. then they told me to try again later. i ended up getting my money via a physical check sent by snail mail. lol. many better options available. stay away!!!!!
data.replyText:
We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. Being unable to link your external account is an incredibly frustrating experience. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this.

Also, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

data.text: Pros: Good app UI, setting up accounts is easy, transferring money is pretty simple. Cons: Credit improvement tools seem gimmicky, esp. Experian Boost. I've had a credit account for nearly 4 months now, my Credit Builder card has been the payment method for all my subscriptions & some utilities since I got it, yet Experian says I have no bills eligible for Boost. Credit report shows my score has not improved through using Chime, rather through paying off other cards. Overall, it's just ok.

I've had Chime for over a year now, no issues. Until I got a Pixel 8 and my notifications stopped working. I emailed customer support telling them this and they refuse to pass it to their development team. I have had 40 EMAILS of back-and-forth from them trying to troubleshoot the issue by telling me to turn my notifications on. Duh! Obviously that was the first thing I did. 0/10 for customer support. Get the notifications working for Pixel 8 and quit with the excuses.
data.replyText:
We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this.

1. Ensure that you are actively logged into your account. If you are actively logged in, log out and back in.
2. Check if you have set your device settings to allow notifications (not just the setting in-app).
3. Confirm that you are not logged into your account on any other device.

data.text: I've used chime since 2019 and I absolutely love them! anytime I've ever had fraudulent charges come up on my account, they notified me so fast, handled it with a great sense of urgency & got it resolved quickly. I also love the Spotme feature they offer! It really helps in between pay days when you are just trying to get by those next few days. I've never used my Spotme until this year, but it's really been a life saver. I also love the fact there's NO monthly fees, doesn't get much better!

Worst customer service experience ever.. I have money in my account and can't get access to it because I no longer have access to the phone number or email linked to my account. I have called them SIX times to attempt to change this and either their dumb verification system fails me even though the person can verify I am the person who is on the account. Or they keep hanging up on me after I have been on the line 30 minutes jumping through multiple hoops. Would not recommend.
data.replyText:
Hi Garrett! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this.

We'll share you feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

data.text: At first i absolutely loved the app and it still has some really nice features. However i originally signed up after receiving a referral for us both to get the $100 promotion. After submitting the direct deposit info i printed directly from chime my direct deposits weren't deposited and caused a ton of issues for me. I was super frustrated but thought it was a fluke accident. I continued to use the app & referred someone myself. The same issue arrised for them & no $100 again. Hmmm ü§î

EDIT:They now no longer show your last payment to a payee. Staying on top of bills is really hard now and I may look elsewhere: I love Chime. They lack some features but they are by far the most stable "mobile" bank and I keep coming back to them. The biggest problem I have though is really big. For years I can't enter decimal points when sending payments or depositing checks. I have to go to the website to schedule payments but checks I just can't deposit because I can't enter the right amount
data.replyText:
Hi Bob! We hear you and can certainly see how this would be useful. We'll share your feedback with our team internally and look into this.

Thanks for being a Chime member! üíö

data.text: It was and is fine, however there are major issues with this app. the inability to cash a check via mobile transfer. I've tried it three times and it hasn't worked once, the reason given is never stated. Even going to chime support they say they don't have records of a transfer being made. Also my card ended up damaged at one point, they claim they can get it to you in 7-10 business days however I ended up waiting for almost a month and a half. Looks good until you realize it isn't functional.

I love chime. I don't know why people have such issues. Definitely less fees then a big box Bank. I actually work for huge Bank but do not bank with them because of the fees they charge. The only issue I've ever had with chime is that they have outages. But I've been with them for three years and never really had an issue. I've disputed charges I transferred money. No issues with any of it. I would highly recommend them and they have a great interest rate on savings!

I seriously regret putting my money on this app! Two different banks share your money. There's no way to get your cash in 1 big lump sum, it costs money each time to take it out in smaller amounts of $100 each time. They also let new fraud transactions go through on cards reported stolen weeks ago, but Reps can't account for how that would be possible. I tried to set it up so that nothing can overdraft but told its not an option. I regret using this app! I want my money back.
data.replyText:
Hi there! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this.

We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services again.

data.text: Switched to Chime as soon as I turned 18 and it was a great decision. The credit builder allowed me to get a 700 credit score as a 19 year old, and I'm still going up. App is easy and intuitive, fast money transfers between accounts and to other people's banks, great overdraft protection. ATMs we're a little confusing at first but now its super convenient. If I'm at a 7-11, Rite Aid, Walgreens or any other convenient store I know I'll have access to cash whenever. Definitely recommend.

Everything is fine as long as you don't need to have a serious issue solved. I called and asked a rep if I could cancel a electronic check payment. I was told the payment never went through so I resubmitted the payment as debit. I recieved a bounced check charge for the check I was told never went thru. Went back and forth for 6 months and never recieved any actual help about why this happened or a refund on the charge they caused. So I gave up trying to get answers.
data.replyText:
Hi Chris! We appreciate the review, and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this.

In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services again.

data.text: *The app still has no Dark mode, really it's been years and it's stuck with a blindingly white theme. The app has a bug which causes the main screen buttons you tap to open the menu to disable or enable your debit or credit card not to open, transfer screen broken too and unreliable often. Driving out of state stopped for gas, ofc their app/network/system went down right before my purchase for gas, left stranded. No way to access you funds when their system is down. No physical branch to visit.
data.replyText:

data.text: It takes away your SpotMe even if you haven't gotten to use it when it's available. I referred a friend and they didn't want to give me the referral fee just because he didn't use my referral link, even though I could prove he got the idea to sign up from me. If you accidentally send money to the wrong person, they don't want to return it to you. Being able to block unauthorized debits via text is pretty unique and the Credit Builder card is useful but a given nowadays.

data.text: Just had this account for a couple of months and already just about done with it. It takes 3 days or longer to move money to my Capital 1 account and can only use my card if there's an option to tap pay. I keep getting an error that my pin is wrong. Finally got a real person on the phone and it took over 2 hours to fix that but it still doesn't work. I am going to change my direct deposit to the Cap 1 account since it takes to long for the money to go thru and I don't ever have issues with it.

data.text: It's nice to have a backup card for emergencies but I don't like that it takes so long for money to be added you should have the option to be able to add it immediately like all the other cash apps sometimes when you add money to your chime it could take over a week to show into your account but when you use your chime card they sure take it out immediately.
data.replyText: Hi Celeste, We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. If we can help with anything, get in touch with us at 1-844-244-6363!

data.text: I see Chime is back to not giving transaction notifications. The LAST TIME THAT HAPPENED, a merchant charged my account fraudulently. This needs to be corrected. UPDATE: To the developer: The notifications have been set to on ALWAYS. IF they are off, it is clearly a malfunction of YOUR APP not my error. Notifications are ALWAYS ON, I WATCH ALL of my accounts.
data.replyText:
Hey Tamieka! We're very sorry about this. You may need to adjust a setting on your device if you're not receiving notifications despite having notifications enabled in the Chime app. Look for the notifications section in your device settings to get started.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app, or at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: I would like to complain about how the notifications are worded. When they start out as "you just spent" it makes me think that a purchase has been made, either online or in a store. Then I see that it was an automatic payment that comes out every month. The wording should be different for recurring bills/payments vs. purchases. The words "you just spent" cause a slight panic when I know I did NOT just "spend" any $ when I'm expecting my phone bill to get withdrawn. See my point?

overall, is an incredible platform with very minimal flaws. it has been incredibly beneficial to me throughout my entire time of using it. I recommend it to all my friends, especially ones financially in trouble, and my friends who would like to have financial freedoms, and able to deposit and withdraw on the go. try this incredibly transparent for their functionality and their purpose and I appreciate that from a business perspective! *Update 2024, going strong! Brought my credit up 100 pts

Best online banking. There really are no fees. The spot me feature is a lifesaver. The credit builder card has helped me rebuild a credit score in just a few months. Much better than a traditional bank. I really do get paid 2 days faster as well. I would give it more stars if I could.

New customer. Have direct deposit, everything works except SpotMe. Big reason I switched to Chime was the fee-free overdrafts. Called the phone number twice, told it should be working, still having issues. Also, now Chime is making me sign into Experian everytime to see my credit score and isn't remembering that I'm already signed in. Will change to five stars once these issues are fixed.
data.replyText:
We appreciate the feedback and we‚Äôre sorry to hear about this. Unable to access your SpotMe is an incredibly frustrating experience.

We‚Äôll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we‚Äôd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member services Team again.

data.text: Customer service isn't great. Chime can do nothing to cancel pending transfers between accounts and has caused me to be late on my rent. Once I'm able to get my money back ( almost $800) , I'm closing my account. This is ridiculous, especially when customer service treats you like you're an idiot. I'm switching back to chase. I wouldn't recommend this service to anyone.
data.replyText: Hi Ryan! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get touch with our Member Services again.

data.text: I love how they say up to $200 overtime or whatever. I've been at $20 for over 2 years now with the same job and my deposits always being over 800 every 2 weeks and still stuck at 20. It's a lie pretty much.. false advertising. Don't use chime just use a different banking app that actually does what they say! (:
data.replyText: Hi Matthew! We're sorry to hear about your recent experience. Your SpotMe limit is set automatically by a variety of factors related to how you use your Chime account. This may include how long you‚Äôve been a member, your account history, and how much you direct deposit per month. We‚Äôll notify you if and when you qualify for a higher limit.

data.text: Having fees taken out every deposit is frustrating. We use the square app for invoices and such, so when it deposits like $300, only getting $289.50 is frustrating. We are immediately looking for a better app. Maybe considering Cashapp. If I could have given a half star I would have. Lost so much money business wise to this. Not worth it.
data.replyText:
Hi Thomas, we appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. Third-party money transfer services that you use to add funds to your Chime Credit Builder or Checking Account may impose their own fees or limits.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363!

data.text: I am still on the fence with this app. I was led to believe my overdraft protection would go up to close to $200 after a couple of direct deposits. Didn't happen...not even close. Just had back surgery and have to have another one soon and I could've used it!

Chime is the Best in Financial Services for me. They are fast and efficient. I like have the option of turning on/off transactions, instant notifications of my purchases, careful watch over my acct if a purchase isn't a normal one for me they send a text immediately ,"was this you," If I say NO it stops it right now avoiding ANY further problems! So many good benefits I can't name them all! OH it's FREE ALL FREE NO COSTS NO HIDDEN FEES NONE!üíúüòÑ

Absolutely the best bank I've had.. Chime, really looks out for their account holders. The credit builder card has gotten my credit score climbing every month. It's crazy how long it's taken to get back on my feet after covid. But i definitely couldn't have done it without Chime's help.

works great! never had hidden fees or issues with a dispute. great for saving, credit building and to receive taxes. if u have a big bank like chase, WF etc... you can attach accounts and separate deposits. connects with Cash App also. great if you're new to banking or not tech savvy

Chime is great! No need to drive to the bank. Everything you need in one app! Checking,Savings and even Credit builder. I set my direct deposit to disperse my money to all three accounts how I choose. And when I'm tapped out and need an extra 20 or so they have the spot me available. Helping me with a few bucks.. you can also send money to anyone and make transfers too! Do everything by phone. Over 5 yr customer now. Chime is Best! Highly Recommend!

unsecured!! I've had 3 separate times unauthorized transactions have occurred and the minute I can open a credit union account I will switch. that being said credit builder has helped me move twords that goal with pretty good results so I give the 3 as a decent middle grounds or a transition between bank and credit union
data.replyText:
Hi Zack! We appreciate the review, and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363!

data.text: It keeps saying check my Internet connection. I have both wifi and phone data. This is where my work check goes so I am needing help. Tha k you for responding so quickly. This is the first issue I've had with the app in two years. It's working great now!
data.replyText:
We appreciate the review, and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. We recommend you to try the steps below:
- Uninstall and reinstall the app.
- Use WiFi (if on cellular data) or cellular data (if on WiFi)
- Try to use a desktop browser or another mobile device

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: Thank you for finally going 'dark' with the app. It does need some tweaks though. The drop mwnu of states has black lettering on a dark background making it nearly impossible to choose the correct option.

Seems that my Round ups are taking longer to show. Love the "Spot Me" feature! 2/28/2024 It's been 5 years since I started using Chime and I absolutely love it!! There is one more feature Chime could allow that would be AWESOME!!.....Use SpotMe to send money if we need to. üòä Thanks in Advance!!!üòâ

I have reinstalled this app for the 4th time now on many different phones, and each time I try to complete an application with you guys, it says that y'all are unable to process my information. This time around, my camera can't see my ID, which is false. Your system is faulty. And don't reply back to this review with "Did you try cleaning your camera, did you try restarting the app, did you try reinstalling the app. How about y'all fix your app.
data.replyText:
Hi Dyvione! We appreciate the review, and we're very sorry about your recent experience. Not being able to enroll is an incredibly frustrating experience.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: I tried everything I can think of and it, for some weird reason, didn't install the latest version. Just instants it a couple days ago and just deleted and got it back and went back to the play store and it showed an update. Did update and still saying "Ooops something is wrong, no internet connection". It's not the internet or my phone cause I've checked every setting that would apply and I'm an NE (past 25 yrs) and in pretty sure it's not my phone or service. Maybe the app I got it through?
data.replyText:
Hi Todd! We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. Having this kind of issue is an incredibly frustrating experience.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us at 1-844-244-6363!

data.text: To sum it up chime has been fine up until the point when I realized that there's no intelligence in the company it takes 7 days for a cashier's check from another bank which is as good as cash worldwide to be deposited into your account and actually be usable. So even if you contact them they just spout the same routine about making sure it doesn't bounce when it's impossible for a cashier's check to bounce. That's all I need to say.
data.replyText:
Hi Tim! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. We determine whether your check is subject to a hold based on a variety of risk factors, which means some of your checks might have a hold time, while others may not.

If you need further assistance, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: Update: Getting the runaround again to change my password as I can't login to my account.. yet again. Very frustrating, you shouldn't have to jump through so many hoops to check your account! This has made me very wary of using Chime for deposits and withdrawals or anything anymore. Original: Just started using Chime and it's a bit disappointing so far. Money transfers take a long time and it's a hassle to change my address so I can get my debit card in the mail.
data.replyText:
We appreciate the review and we‚Äôre sorry to hear about this. Unable to access your account is an incredibly frustrating experience.

We‚Äôll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we‚Äôd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member services Team again.

data.text: I've been using chime since 2018 and love it. some of the best parts are the savings acount, the chime credit card which can help build your credit, and the spot me which loans you money if your broke until you get paid. I'm a single mom with 2 kids trying to make ends meet so when I'm broke and need a little help chime is always there and they dont charge interest for the spot me which is one of the best parts. I love using chime and wouldn't want to use any other banking app!!!

I'm giving a 5 start because it's nothing what everyone would tell me and also has helped improve my credit so score so much When I was looking for a new bank I joined chime I was told not to cause it's not a real bank it's a scam etc but it's really not it's a real bank a future bank well anyway chime is great also if you use there credit card it's an amazing thing it's everything they say it is they help you improve your credit score if you use it wish I can write more but I'm limited.

Chime has helped improve my credit score. Easy to use. Very pleased with the switch from a branched bank to Chime. plus the fact that if you go over your available funds it covers up to the amount of boost you have built up. No over draft fees. Just give a tip for covering the expense.

Anyone having issues with the app not letting you transfer out let alone switch to what account your actually trying to send to money to ?? Won't let me add my chase bank account. I've added my banking debit card multiple times and it STILL isn't letting me transfer like that. I've tried linking my bank account hella times to and still nothing. Customer service was not help, looked into my account no issues, but said try trouble shooting my phone. It's the app itself, I'm pissed I can't get my $
data.replyText:
Hi Tiffany, we appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this.

We'll share this with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services again.

data.text: I have never had any problems with this app. Walgreens does free money deposits. Transfer is always free and instant. As of late though. I noticed that in my notifications. The one that tells me I have spent money and how much I have left. Has been extremely off. Even after I had added more money. Please fix. Cause update didn't help.

Beware ! They will move your money without your prior knowledge or permission. Tax refund went to checking. Within one minute, Chime moved it to an account that had a disputed transaction already under investigation. Contact chime "support" and I'm transferred a literal 6 times before being hung up on. Called again and from these technical wizzards mouths "are you sure you didn't do this and just forgot?". Never once understood my issue, no solutions even discussed. I'm not done.
data.replyText:
We appreciate the review. To disable the automated money movement, you may try these in the app:

Tap Settings.
Go to Account Settings.
Go to Credit Builder.
Tap Move My Pay.
Tap Don't move future deposit.
Tap Don't Move My Pay to confirm the change.

If you give us another chance we'd love to turn this around if you get in touch with us again.

data.text: TY for your prompt reply üòÅAfter installing, I initially forgot I was with Chime several years ago & just now signed up. Got the alert stating I have an acct, please log in. I clicked log in, went through the steps expecting to see "forgot password", it never did. I logged in 4 times but keep getting "already have an acct". IF I hear back from customer service, I'm only gonna try 1 time via their instructions. If it doesn't work, I'm going elsewhere.
data.replyText:
Hi Helen! We appreciate the feedback, and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience..

If you need further assistance, get in touch with us in at 1-844-244-6363!

data.text: Absolutely. Love this app My credit score over a 100 points. It writes down every transaction for you so you don't even have to keep your Receipts. Easy access to atms Even could follow your taxes with them.Chances to win extra money. Definitely think everybody should have.This as a secondary account

3/16/24 Chime & app have been great for the 3.5 yrs. that I've had an acct. Sadly, one of my cards had charges I didn't make months ago, and I was issued a new one. As of yesterday, it'll be the 4th replacement card issued.I'm disturbed that the customer service rep. flat out lied to me twice. Once about which card was reissued & then offered expedited 3 day shipping, I did find that odd when I found out today. I've read that others are having issues w/ missing cards from different co.'s.
data.replyText: Hi Micah! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

data.text: FOCUS: It does NOT work with either Zelle or Cash App. This will be highly disappointing if you have friends or relatives that send you. Yes, you get your paycheck earlier because your employer gives them the information earlier, and they do not hold it; however, almost everybody's doing that nowadays, so that got them the three stars. I took two off for not working with Zelle Or Cash App. They could accept it if they wanted to. It's not the technology, it's their policy.
data.replyText:
Hi Keith! We appreciate the review and were sorry about your recent experience. We'll share your feedback with our team internally and look into this.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: I've had chime for years. I recently got a new phone and now the notifications are not coming through. they used to come through once a day and also every time my the card was used. but now I'm not getting any notifications. I have gone into the app and make sure all my notifications were marked and they were. I have uninstalled the app and reinstalled the app. turned my phone off and back on. and none of it's working. I've even checked on my phone to make sure that my phone was allowing chime
data.replyText:

We‚Äôll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we‚Äôd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with us at 1-844-244-6363

data.text: I'm leaving this rating because Chime doesn't offer instant transfers from linked accounts. It takes over 7 days for transactions to reflect, which can be inconvenient in emergencies. Adding this feature would attract more customers to the app.
data.replyText:
Hi Franklin! We hear you and can certainly see how this would be useful. We'll share your feedback internally and look into this.

Thanks for being a Chime member! üíö

data.text: I logged into my account on my mom's phone because my Internet went out. I had to confirm it was me to log in.. yet they still locked my account with no warning. It took me a week to even regain access to my own money.. I tried for 3 months, EVERY SINGLE DAY calling them, waiting on emails, emailing back, all the photos, verification. And nothing! You can't get help without a miracle! I've tried a few times a month after. But I gave up. Credit Karma is equally as good. And not locking me out!!!
data.replyText:
Hi there! We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. We‚Äôll share your feedback with our team and look into this.

In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

data.text: the app is not user friendly, you can't close your account unless you use the chat option to find an agent. The chat gets frozen every 2 seconds. There is no customer agent on the phone. very stubborn app, it will push its debit card every time you want to pay something online. more ethics ppl, more ethics, and less hunting for individuals' sensitive data and money
data.replyText: Hi Marika! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get touch with our Member Services again.

data.text: I love using Chime. The app is awesome, it has everything you need right at your fingertips and they are always adding new features. I love the overdraft options. As hard as times are right now I can use my overdraft and not have to worry about paying an overdraft fee. Thank You Chime.

An amazing bank that my girlfriend recommended to me. Love that it also connects seamlessly with Google Pay and even my credit union. Absolutely adore this app and its free to use format. This makes banking easy and accessible. No complaints other than please try your best to raise the savings account monthly interest rate! We need more reliable rates these days.

Missing a lot of features other ebanks have. Real easy to put money in, real hard to get money back. Virtual debit cards are a lie, support has never used the app in their life and are also confused about what features exist. Skip this one. EDIT: I have a hard time with the canned "please try again" responses. That rep cited policy. Are you suggesting he was lying or that the next rep can override policy unlike the previous? Seems unlikely to do anything more than waste my time further.
data.replyText:
Hi Gary! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. Having issues with our features is a frustrating experience.

We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance, we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

data.text: Worst customer service I've ever experienced. App is a pain in the butt to navigate, and there is no option to customize your card. When you receive money, it takes 3 days for it to transfer to another account. Definitely not using this app anymore.
data.replyText:
Hi Ashley! We appreciate the feedback and we‚Äôre sorry to hear about this. Having that kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

We‚Äôll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we‚Äôd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member services Team again.

data.text: UPDATE: After having this account for a while, I find that this is way better than cashApp, more secure than paypal, and better than any lousy brick and mortar bank. Thank you for this service. The only thing I don't like is the fact that I cannot select how much I want to add to my credit builder card and my savings account.

I've been with them for a good while. constantly getting my pay checks deposited but yet spot me never gets increased. I'm stuck at a twenty dollar limit. and twenty dollars extra if I get all four boosts. my spot me gets payed back literally with in 72 hours. so the spot me on chime has been a false lie on that being increased cause it don't for me and I make at least 1800 every two weeks unless I take out a daily pay. other than that. I've not had any issues
data.replyText:
Hi Jacob! We're very sorry about your recent experience. Your SpotMe limit is set automatically by a variety of factors related to how you use your Chime account. This may include how long you‚Äôve been a member, your account history, and how much you direct deposit per month.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: BEST BANK I HAVE EVER HAD. I thought not having a physical bank would be an issue but their customer service online and over the phone is quick, knowledgeable and top knotch. Most of the time, I don't even notice this is a completely online bank because everything is so smooth and accessible. they work harder than any brick and mortar bank I have ever had. I will never use any other bank and I'm a customer of over 3 years now.

Love how easy Chime us to use! I only wish the company supported wire transfers, which is the only reason I didn't give a 5 star rating. Buying a house is difficult enough, but Chime not supporting wire transfers made it a nightmare. I almost wasn't able to close on the deal.

no nonsense, not cashapp but way better. free spot me always a plus. easy transfers, secure credit. just great and I usually don't care to review banking institutions because I think the fed are thrives but...whatever...chime works for me, don't need a physical bank.

been banking with them for years now and I'm completely satisfied any issue customer service has resolved it swiftly and effectively...love the card lock feature and getting paid two days early is also the best since I get paid weekly there are more months where I'm getting an extra check which I'd always nice!!

It would be a fantastic financial institution if they wouldn't report your credit builder payment as "late" on your credit report when there is no monthly payment amount. This ultimately makes your score decrease rather than increase as advertised.
data.replyText:
We're very sorry about your recent experience. Impact on your credit may vary, as Credit scores are independently determined by credit bureaus based on a number of factors, including the financial decisions you make with other financial services organizations.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: 2 Star = credit builder works Credit dispute process is unsatisfactory. I don't feel confident in the process at all. Luckily the amount was only a couple 100 dollars and not a couple 1,000. Still my money is my money and I want to be able to depend on my card company to help me when the merchant sends me an email telling me I'm entitled to a refund and I should dispute the claim. Photos to support your claim are all you can submit. The whole process feels like it's run out of a garage. I'm done
data.replyText:
Hi Byron! We recognize how impactful this is for you and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. Not getting your refund is an incredibly frustrating experience.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: best money app ever and I've tried them all so that's saying something. it's all in one money account that allows you to access direct deposit up to two days early and also payday front for only $1.99 plus boost if needed, what more could you ask for in a money app?!

Great. Been using it for years. Although, it would be nice to have a search option in the transactions. I have so many, it gets ridiculous trying to find just one specific entry from endless scrolling.

Absolutely theeeee best online banking app you could ever ask for. The new feature deals near me is amazing. Not to mention all the other perks without the fees. Loyal customer for 5+ years. ‚ô•Ô∏è it. Thank you Chime
Best banking app out there. Everything is free, including transfers. Also, with direct deposit you get overdraft protection, which is also free up to $200. No complaints after 4 years.

The app overall is pretty sweet. Been using it for a while, and between the secured credit card (?), The debit card and the savings, I'm enjoying it quite a bit. For the love of all that is holy, if you need your money, DO NOT EVER use the "Check cashing via photo" feature. it takes forever to get YOUR money. I used it Friday Mar. 1 at 7:01 AM PST, and here it is, Mar. 7, 4:40 PM PST, and the app says my funds will be available "end of the day". Just gotta starve for another 8 hours. #Hungry
data.replyText: Hey there! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. We'll pass your feedback along to our team and look into this. In the meantime if we can help with anything, you contact us at 1-844-244-6363.

data.text: My account was hacked. A friend warned me, but I didn't listen. At first it was a small amount, they gave it back. Six months later they hit me again. I disputed and they made a decision in hours saying, no error occurred. I rebuttaled this and within hours again they stated, no error occurred. I have text messages from them asking if transactions were made from my account at the same times. I do not recommend anyone to bank here. Now my money is missing and I closed this account. Bad business.
data.replyText:
Hey Nic! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. Having experienced this is incredibly frustrating.

We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.
